alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued October 08 at 3:31PM HST until October 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND BIG ISLAND... .An incoming north swell will generate low-end advisory surf along most north facing shores beginning Sunday morning and continuing through at least Sunday night. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 10 to 15 feet. * WHERE...North facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and the Big Island. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
